pttrobo 0.1.6.9001

    Ennustekuviot Kuviot
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    All functions

    aplot_lines() aplot_trends()
    Basic PTT line plot
    draw_ennuste()
    Draw using yaml specification and corresponding prediction data from excel
    ennuste_time_serie_from_excel()
    Read ennustedata from excel file and put it into plotly friendly time serie
    excel_files_ennustedata()
    Get excel files from ennustedata folder
    pttrobo_print_filter() pttrobo_print_filter_recode()
    Print full filtering for Robonomist id or data
    ptt_copy_ennustedata()
    Copy ennustedata to teams
    ptt_data_robo() ptt_data_robo_l() ptt_data_robo_c()
    Get Data with robonomistClient in PTT Format
    ptt_plot()
    Creates a plotly object with visual specifications of ptt.
    ptt_plot_add_prediction_traces()
    Add prediction traces to an existing ptt_plot.
    ptt_plot_add_secondary_traces()
    Add secondary traces of existing traces with reduced linewidth to an existing ptt_plot.
    ptt_plot_create_widget()
    Writes an html element for embedding.
    ptt_plot_set_colors()
    Gives a vector of desired length of colors.
    ptt_update_ennustedata()
    Update PTT ennustedata from yaml definitions
    yaml_files_ennustedata()
    Get yaml files from ennustedata folder
    yaml_to_excel()
    Read data yaml file, get data, and output xlxs files
    yaml_to_plotly_data()
    Read output kuvio yaml file, containing specification for picture. Can handle up to 3 different data spesifications.
    yearly_change()
    Transforms absolute values to yearly change

    Developed by Janne Huovari.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.2.
